  • Method Details

    • getDefaultRelease

      public String getDefaultRelease()
      Description copied from interface: JctCompiler
      Get the default release to use if no release or target version is specified.

      This can not be configured.

      Returns:
      the default release version to use.

    • getEarliestSupportedVersionInt

      public static int getEarliestSupportedVersionInt(boolean modules)
      Get the minimum version of Javac that is supported.
      Parameters:
      modules - whether modules need to be supported or not.
      Returns:
      the minimum supported version.

    • getLatestSupportedVersionInt

      public static int getLatestSupportedVersionInt(boolean modules)
      Get the maximum version of Javac that is supported.
      Parameters:
      modules - whether to require module support or not. This is currently ignored but exists for future compatibility purposes.
      Returns:
      the maximum supported version.
